channel.title: glazeruns TikTok
channel.description: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from glazeruns

item.title: I've been running for decades, and there's one piece of gear I've used longer than anything else. Not my shoes. Not my watch. Not even my jorts. My @feetures socks. I'm so happy to be partnering with Feetures, a brand I've trusted for years. From UTMB in
item.description: I've been running for decades, and there's one piece of gear I've used longer than anything else. Not my shoes. Not my watch. Not even my jorts. My @feetures socks. I'm so happy to be partnering with Feetures, a brand I've trusted for years. From UTMB in

item.title: Javelina Jundred time! LFG #runtok #javelinajundred
item.description: Javelina Jundred time! LFG #runtok #javelinajundred

item.title: that was hard #javelinajundred #runtok
item.description: that was hard #javelinajundred #runtok

item.title: I was wrecked
item.description: I was wrecked

item.title: After finishing a big race everything falls apart for a short period. I was a hot mess, but Lauren got me back together after a shower and shit. Some food and a nap. #runtok
item.description: After finishing a big race everything falls apart for a short period. I was a hot mess, but Lauren got me back together after a shower and shit. Some food and a nap. #runtok

item.title: I'm going to be really sore for a couple of days #runtok #javelinajundred
item.description: I'm going to be really sore for a couple of days #runtok #javelinajundred

item.title: they hurt so bad #javelinajundred #runtok
item.description: they hurt so bad #javelinajundred #runtok

item.title: Javelina Jundred put my feet through the ringer. Hot, dry, sandy desert trails with tons of sharp rocks gave my feet some issues. But my overall foot strategy worked: 1.) KT tape around the toes 2.) @getsaltybritches lube coating my entire foot 3.) @feet
item.description: Javelina Jundred put my feet through the ringer. Hot, dry, sandy desert trails with tons of sharp rocks gave my feet some issues. But my overall foot strategy worked: 1.) KT tape around the toes 2.) @getsaltybritches lube coating my entire foot 3.) @feet

item.title: I'll continue using this shoe for many more miles. Just like a fresh pair for a race. I'm really enjoying the new challenger 8s. Big improvement from the 7s. IMHO. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #runtok #javelinajundred
item.description: I'll continue using this shoe for many more miles. Just like a fresh pair for a race. I'm really enjoying the new challenger 8s. Big improvement from the 7s. IMHO. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #runtok #javelinajundred

item.title: Javelina Jundred ✅️ Big thanks to @troycroxdale for pacing me the last 20 miles. Big thanks to aravaipa running for putting on another great event. Big thanks to all the volunteers who kept me iced and hydrated throughout the race. Big thanks to everyone
item.description: Javelina Jundred ✅️ Big thanks to @troycroxdale for pacing me the last 20 miles. Big thanks to aravaipa running for putting on another great event. Big thanks to all the volunteers who kept me iced and hydrated throughout the race. Big thanks to everyone

item.title: 25,000 votes and Waldo won. i am a man of my word. Javelina 100: Done. 22:05. 11 days after finishing Moab 240. 98 hours and 239 miles in the desert, then barely over a week later, back out for another hundred. One minute faster than my previous Javelina
item.description: 25,000 votes and Waldo won. i am a man of my word. Javelina 100: Done. 22:05. 11 days after finishing Moab 240. 98 hours and 239 miles in the desert, then barely over a week later, back out for another hundred. One minute faster than my previous Javelina

item.title: This is my Feetures Merino 10 Ultra Light 100 Mile Glaze Pack. I got to pick the colors myself: blue, green, and black. I wanted socks that could match my personality each day. Since Feetures doesn’t make jort-colored socks, I went with the ones I liked b

item.title: Good luck to everyone running in the morning. NYC marathon is so amazing, but heads up. Plan on walking a mile or more after the cross the line. It's a loooooong walk. Lauren just said she might do LA Marathon with me so everyone tag her and encourage her
item.description: Good luck to everyone running in the morning. NYC marathon is so amazing, but heads up. Plan on walking a mile or more after the cross the line. It's a loooooong walk. Lauren just said she might do LA Marathon with me so everyone tag her and encourage her

item.title: NYC Marathon today! So jealous of all you runners @Lauren Glaze #runtok

item.title: And got 4 more weeks the streak. It was a good month #runtok
item.description: And got 4 more weeks the streak. It was a good month #runtok

item.title: Looks like over 68,000 tickets and 10,000 people have entered so far and you have until November 21st to enter. May the odds be ever in your favor. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #runtok #westernstates100
item.description: Looks like over 68,000 tickets and 10,000 people have entered so far and you have until November 21st to enter. May the odds be ever in your favor. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #runtok #westernstates100

item.title: Because I've been actively trying to be MORE ran through for the past decade. 100,000+ kilometers ran through. 295 weeks of 100+ mile weeks ran through. Many ultramarathons ran through. If having Strava and being ran through is wrong, I don't want to be r

item.description: Ask your pacer if they saw that #runtok

item.title: 5.67 years of 100+ mile weeks in a row. Seems like a lot. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #runtok
item.description: 5.67 years of 100+ mile weeks in a row. Seems like a lot. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #runtok

item.title: And I'm inviting you to join me. There will be some long runs and hopefully you can join me for some miles. Details will be coming soon. But for now, I've said it outloud. Time to lock in. Smile, or you're doing it wrong.
item.description: And I'm inviting you to join me. There will be some long runs and hopefully you can join me for some miles. Details will be coming soon. But for now, I've said it outloud. Time to lock in. Smile, or you're doing it wrong.

item.title: I'm not sure that answers how I'm going to do it though. I'm looking at lots of opportunities for group runs if you want to join me. We will definitely do the last and longest run on December 7th. That will probably be from Redlands to Newport Beach on th

item.title: I love learning from failure, but these past couple months have been rough. If you've noticed my webpage has been down, my merch unavailable, or wondered why the book timeline changed—here's why. I had to stop everything and start over. New team. New syst
item.description: I love learning from failure, but these past couple months have been rough. If you've noticed my webpage has been down, my merch unavailable, or wondered why the book timeline changed—here's why. I had to stop everything and start over. New team. New syst

item.title: Lube is life. Been using @getsaltybritches for several years now and it really works well. Another small business that's awesome to support. Smile, or you're doing it wrong
item.description: Lube is life. Been using @getsaltybritches for several years now and it really works well. Another small business that's awesome to support. Smile, or you're doing it wrong

item.title: Building up for the big one, 300 miles on week 300. This week? 96 hours at the fire station. Rain almost every run. Body already questioning my life choices. We like challenges. This is why we do this. Three more weeks until I attempt something truly ridi
item.description: Building up for the big one, 300 miles on week 300. This week? 96 hours at the fire station. Rain almost every run. Body already questioning my life choices. We like challenges. This is why we do this. Three more weeks until I attempt something truly ridi

item.title: Pulled off the win although I had to really work for it. 100 miles/161 km does not come easily. Especially when the race starts at 6pm. Born to Run 100 miler was an incredible experience and I will be back. #runtok #ultramarathon #ultrarunner #borntorun
item.description: Pulled off the win although I had to really work for it. 100 miles/161 km does not come easily. Especially when the race starts at 6pm. Born to Run 100 miler was an incredible experience and I will be back. #runtok #ultramarathon #ultrarunner #borntorun
